column4: hi, im looking for some help with vim on ubuntu server.  anyone care to tell me how to exit the program?
im in command mode, but it just beeps at me
i pressed escape, but ive got no where to type a command
i can go into insert mode by pressing 'i', and type into the document
but if i press q it doesnt exit, and i can't type q!
how many answers did you get?
i finally pressed shift + q and it put me into "ex mode" and there I could type :q! and quit
it said i could go to normal mode by typing "visual" which is the mode im in normally apparently.  whats the difference?
for kill a hanged program: from another terminal: ps -ef -> get pid ->kill it
how do i open another terminal?  i'm in ubuntu server and there is no ui
also, i did the :i command and i'm in insert mode.  pressing ESC doenst bring me back to command mode.  whats the deal there?
i sent you a chat invitation.  if you could help me with something that'd be great
